Claim #1: "Pure Storage's Evergreen program is only expensive support and provides little value."

Pure's Advantage: Pure Evergreen//Forever represents much more than just controller upgrades. It includes free controller upgrades (Ever Modern), anytime controller upgrades with capacity expansion (Ever Agile), and higher capacity media swap with trade-in credit (Capacity Consolidation). This also includes non-disruptive upgrades across product generations, ensuring continuous improvement without disruptive migrations.
